title: continued issues with phone activating in pocket and calling emergency services
content:
Hi there.

Over the past month or so, I've experienced at lot of times [upwards of 100+] where the phone, turned off will activate in my pocket when walking, even typing responses in emails/messages, and has called emergency services 5 times now.     The phone also repeatedly zooms in [e.g. tripple tap] when in my pocket.

info to help
lock screen set to 'show conversations, default and silent'
sensitive notifications - turned off
hide silent notifications in status bar - activated
swipe fingerprint for notifications - turned off
system up to date on Android 11 and monthly security updates to June.

Don't know what else to do.  Can anyone advise.  Many thanks.
